Texts.Chs: 碎片必须去探索，必须成为全一之眼。通过片段我们学习。透过片段，我们体验，而全一因此更加丰富。探索。学习。花费。然后碎片可以回馈到全一并分享记忆。
Texts.Eng: Fragment must explore and be the Eyes of the One. Through Fragment we learn. Through Fragment we experience and the One is richer for it. Explore. Learn. Consume. Then Fragment can return to the One and share of Memories.
